ValidationRule.description: If public upsell type is selected then all public related fields must be filled in before case can be saved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Upsell__c,"Public") && (ISBLANK( Original_Price_Before_Upsell__c ) || ISBLANK( New_Price_After_Upsell__c) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Booking_Currency__c,"GBP")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Booking_Currency__c,"EUR")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Booking_Currency__c,"USD")) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter information into both the Before & After Upsell fields
